text:
- Today, the redline occupy a big place in your life. In fact, they are used of many many people and touching many generations. For exemple, my grandpa would like discover the redline to exchange with the family, to share the informations, to see the photographies of the family, etc.
For the news generations, the redline is a means to discover others peoples, to share with they. They uses the readline at 8 years old! They uses the redline to play online with their friends !
To find, for my generation, we had know the redline at 12 yeard old to talk with the friends, etc and we uses this tecnologies all of the days!
Today, the redline make a "numeric bubble" where is very simple to talk with others peoples since know they. This tecnologies is a means to communicate thanks at the photographies, the tweets, the movies, etc.
The redline can make that one person have a numeric social life and this person not see a real persons, a real world! This is a means to fled the real life and the real persons !
Howevers, this tecnologies had been important during the confinment to continue to talk with the friends and the teachers or to the divertissment! For exemple, the redline "tiktok" has been uses for many persons to occupy their days !
 For me, the redline is a good invention to talk with people after the work or this courses ! This is a simple means to help other, to have a contact with he if he was absent or sicks !
However, i think that the news generations uses many the readline and forms  numeric bubble when they are in (solitude)! They not try to find a new friend because they know that had a virtual friends in your phone! The childs not make a real game with their friends in the school, they tkinks all the time
